body_content.explanation: to be the first to do something or go somewhere, showing that it is also possible for other people, organizations, etc.:
examples: Hong Kong shares surged, trailblazing a recovery for Asian markets.
The new car has significance for all of us because it trailblazes technology that will become more widely available.
There was something in that work that inspired me, and I felt like I was trailblazing.
